Pretty good job so far

This game is not for everyone, me included. I am not a Huge fan and everytime i play it either pallet looping or just getting rekt, the skill gap is a crap ton. Where is a more casual option? Is it a fun game, for some people yes, but i do not enjoy being a useless person and just sitting there wondering what the heck i cna do to the killer. I don't understand how people enjoy it because its just so ugh for me. playing killer is okay but meh. honestly, try it at your own risk, never know you may like it and think im dumb. or you'll be like me and hate every time you log on

Pros:
Good scary game
Mostly nice community
Cool and interesting aspects
Cons:
Connect from anywhere (Laggy killer = Laggy game)
Bugs literally everywhere
High chance your game might not even load and kick you out
The bad side of the community
Developers that don't give that much of a shit about the bugs

Ich habe mittlerweile 645 Spielstunden und war am Anfang echt begeistert.

Jetzt aber entwickelt es sich immer mehr zu einer Entt√§uschung: 
- in jeder Runde fliegt ein Mitspieler im Lade-Screen raus
- die Hitboxen sind teilweise richtig l√§cherlich, der Killer trifft dich zwei Etagen weiter unten
- Bugs sind Tagesordnung: Totems sind nach der Zerst√∂rung immer noch aktiv, getroffene Skillchecks z√§hlen nicht
- und es ist nicht wirklich ausgeglichen: es geht sehr zugunsten der Killer. Neue Killer sind nicht mehr besiegbar, wundersch√∂n overpowered.

Mittlerweile nicht mehr empfehlenswert. Schade.

The parts that Dead by Daylight gets right are the characters and the perk system.However the game didn't manage to balance the killers and the survivors.Even if a player has the technical skills with a survivor most of the times it doesn't matter,the killer still gets him pretty easily.The game is fun to play with friends.Especially in a group of 4.Its worth the try but the thing that harms the game the most is that the repetitiveness is made in a pretty annoying way.I recommend waiting for a  discount!6/10

Honestly it‚Äôs great besides the fact that the killer is a bit to OP. Like I understand you‚Äôre supposed to survive but there‚Äôs hooks probably around EVERY corner which gives the players absolutely no time to wiggle out. Add like 2-3 less hooks and it‚Äôd be great.

I recommend. 

A very well-rounded game. Certain mechanics I've not seen elsewhere. 
It's fun as a survivor or a killer.

Some of these negative reviews are about COMMUNITY. 
As if devs can fix that, uh-huh. 
It's a violent game that attracts bad hombres. big surprise. 

The rest about "OP" killers. 
This simply isn't true. 
I've played games as a Killer where I DESTROYED the enemy team.
I've played games as a Killer where I was HELPLESS as survivors run circles, taunt and constantly harass me. 

Why? Because they worked together. That's what you're supposed to do. 
Once players figure out a Killer's tactics it's almost too easy to evade, and defeat them.  
Otherwise, most random's simply won't cooperate effectively. That's life. 

I've seen it said elsewhere like this:
>Get new Killer
>Merc Survivors
>community cries about "OP" New Killer
>devs nerf killer
>Survivors:"it's free real estate."
>Repeat.

Dead by Daylight √© um jogo bom, mas √© uma porra de jogar. Ningu√©m merece jogar um jogo online que n√£o tem sequer servidores pr√≥prios, √© um inferno de ping horroroso, os assassinos ficam teletransportando e n√£o d√° nem para escapar. A mec√¢nica do jogo de perder os itens quando o host desconecta tamb√©m √© outro defeito que tem que ser corrigido, voc√™ fica literalmente horas pra upar o personagem pra no final usar um item ou oferenda que simplesmente SOME quando o host desconecta (e isso piora quando o host v√™ uma oferenda rara e quita de prop√≥sito s√≥ pra foder o jogo). A comunidade √© t√≥xica. Existem assassinos que camperam a merda do jogo INTEIRO e fode mais ainda o jogo (s√≥ te faz passar raiva). 

Deveria tamb√©m ter a op√ß√£o de conversa por √°udio e deveriam parar de ficar COBRANDO DLC PRA CADA PERSONAGEM NOVO. O jogo j√° √© pago e se voc√™ quiser ter a experi√™ncia completa vai ter que desembolsar praticamente o triplo do valor do jogo pra ter todos os personagens que n√£o s√£o liberados por uma moeda do jogo e sim por dinheiro real. Enfim, tamb√©m existem muitos bugs que devem ser corrigidos e tamb√©m muitos personagens apel√µes que s√£o praticamente imposs√≠veis de jogar contra. 

Em resumo, DBD √© um jogo bom, mas √© s√≥ mais um jogo que te faz morrer de raiva por ser inacabado. Melhorem esse jogo para AGORA!

Bon jeu dans le sens o√π on consid√®re que la communaut√© ne le d√©t√©riore pas compl√®tement, manque d'efforts des d√©veloppeurs √† √©couter la communaut√©, id√©e globale du jeu bonne mais mal ex√©cut√©e.
Le gameplay est plut√¥t bon m√™me si certains bugs sont g√™nant.
Les bugs de connexion de ce jeu sont un des plus gros soucis qui demeure depuis plusieurs ann√©es sans solutions apport√©es.
Certains moments sur ce jeu peuvent √™tre tr√®s frustrant mais peut √©galement √™tre positif m√™me si le c√¥t√© frustrant d√©pend surtout de la communaut√© qui je le rappelle et horrible.
Je le recommande aux personnes tr√®s patiente.
About to give up on this game, every game I play, I get a rank update error... it's basically unplayable now... been going on for almost a week....

Now let me make this clear, Dead by Daylight could be in a better state right now, but in all honestly, the game is extremely fun. Yes, the matchmaking is a joke, and the imbalance for some Killers in-game is ludicrous, but I can look past that. Because at its core, Dead by Daylight is one of the most fun games I have ever played. There's a lot of issues, but they've been addressed and the devs are working to fix those issues. The game could be a LOT better, but as it stands, Dead by Daylight is...well...fun.

I would definitely recommend this game, UNLESS you are looking for a strictly fair and competitive game. Dead by Daylight can be fun for everyone, but you're not going to get a game that allows you to use your skills all the time. DBD is an amazing experience when playing casually, but is a NIGHTMARE when playing competitively. 

All in all, yes, I recommend DBD for the casual player. But ONLY for casual players. The game has too many balance issues to make it fun for people that want a 100% fair game. Until the devs fix a LOT of issues, this game will mainly be for people looking to have some laughs in good fun.

But hey, that's just some idiot's opinion.

This game has good potential but it is too loop-oriented and too reliant on aura perks for killers. Really fun game when played with friends. Even when I was alone I played killer and enjoyed the crap out of it. Despite the "occasional" faulty hitboxes and 2-3 people lobbies, the game managed to stay fun. The community has been friendly (this far) and i managed to make some friends.
Some things you should expect if you are willing to buy this game:
-facecamping or tunneling (rarely)
-bs random hits
-bad ranked matchmaking
-pallets
-bs random hits
-and finally bs random hits
9/10, would be a 10/10 if you fix hitboxes and matchmaking.

I realize that an asymmetrical multiplayer game can be difficult to balance, but Dead by Daylight unfortunately still isn't there. Many matches will leave you feeling unsatisfied and frustrated. Many of the perks are useless with only a few being deemed "necessary". Lag and connection are a complete gamble; good luck finding a match with a full five players.
